file.name: positive3.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Simple API Overview
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  "/":
    get:
      operationId: listVersionsv2
      summary: List API versions
      responses:
        "200":
          description: 200 response
          content:
            application/json:
              examples:
                foo:
                  value:
                    versions:
                      - status: CURRENT
                        updated: "2011-01-21T11:33:21Z"
                        id: v2.0
                        links:
                          - href: http://127.0.0.1:8774/v2/
                            rel: self
components:
  schemas:
    GeneralError:
      type: object
      discriminator:
        propertyName: petType
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          maxLength: 15
          format: int32
          pattern: .*
        message:
          type: string
          maxLength: 15
          pattern: ^[0-9a-z]{15}$
      required:
        - petType
  requestBodies:
    NewItem:
      description: A JSON object containing item data
      required: true
      content:
        multipart/form-data:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GeneralError"
          examples:
            tshirt:
              $ref: "#/components/examples/tshirt"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: requestBodies: "NewItem": content: multipart/form-data: examples: "tshirt": resolve "#/components/examples/tshirt": component by reference "#/components/examples/tshirt" not found
